name: vscode-fecs-plugin
description: A better fecs extension for vscode.

vscode-fecs-plugin.disableCheck.title: Disable check by default
vscode-fecs-plugin.disableCheck.description: Controls if disable check by default when vscode start/restart/reload

vscode-fecs-plugin.ignoreGlobalEslintDis.title: Ignore `/* eslint-disalbe */` in js file
vscode-fecs-plugin.ignoreGlobalEslintDis.description: Controls if ignore `/* eslint-disalbe */` in js file

vscode-fecs-plugin.autoFormatOnSave.title: Auto format on save
vscode-fecs-plugin.autoFormatOnSave.description: Controls if auto format on save a document

vscode-fecs-plugin.en.title: Fecs use English in output
vscode-fecs-plugin.en.description: Controls if use English in output

vscode-fecs-plugin.level.title: Fecs check level
vscode-fecs-plugin.level.description: Fecs check level. Value is 0 1 or 2

vscode-fecs-plugin.jsLikeExt.title: Fecs files with these extensions
vscode-fecs-plugin.jsLikeExt.description: Specified 'js like' files extension that can use fecs.

vscode-fecs-plugin.cssLikeExt.title: Fecs files with these extensions
vscode-fecs-plugin.cssLikeExt.description: Specified 'css like' files extension that can use fecs.

vscode-fecs-plugin.htmlLikeExt.title: Fecs files with these extensions
vscode-fecs-plugin.htmlLikeExt.description: Specified 'html like' files extension that can use fecs.

vscode-fecs-plugin.vueLikeExt.title: Fecs files with these extensions
vscode-fecs-plugin.vueLikeExt.description: Specified 'vue like' files extension that can use fecs.

vscode-fecs-plugin.supportByGitDomainTes.title: Only support git repositories that remote url match this configuration item.
vscode-fecs-plugin.supportByGitDomainTes.description: Only support git repositories that remote url match this configuration item.

vscode-fecs-plugin.excludePaths.title: Uncheck the files in these directory
vscode-fecs-plugin.excludePaths.description: Uncheck the files in these directory.

vscode-fecs-plugin.excludeFileNameSuffix.title: Uncheck the files with these suffixes
vscode-fecs-plugin.excludeFileNameSuffix.description: Uncheck the files with these suffixes.

commands.title: vscode-fecs-plugin: Add disable rule comments for entire selection block
